en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors TM-WMC Kelantan International Muay Thai Challenge 2009!
en.content:
REPORT SUBMITTED BY PRESIDENTIAL DIRECTOR WAN MOHAMAD FIRDAUS.

TM-WMC Kelantan International Muay Thai Challenge 2009 Piala Menteri Besar Kelantan was held at Sultan Muhammad IV Stadium, Kota Bharu, Kelantan on 27th - 29th March 2009. The event was organized by Boxx Event with Telekom Malaysia as the title sponsor, and FusionExcel as the only co-sponsor. Kelantan Government and also many other Muay-Thai clubs supported it. With over 30,000 spectators, the event was held for 3 days with 24 thrilling matches participated by contenders from various countries.

FusionExcel International proudly sponsored Quantum Pendants and Quantum Sports Flasks for all contenders from Boxx Warriors. 6 contenders who won 6 out of the 8 matches presented the Boxx Warriors team! 

3 leaders represented FusionExcel during the event, Wan Mohamad Firdaus, Alafzar Kushairy & Ahmad Baahir. A mock cheque for the sponsorship of RM 13,000.00 from FusionExcel to Encik Zahari Ahmad Razali, CEO of Boxx Event by FusionExcel Presidential Director Wan Mohamad Firdaus. A pair of Quantum Watches  was also presented to Timbalan Menteri Besar (Deputy Chief Minister) Kelantan Datuk Ahmad Yaacob by FusionExcel Director Alafzar Kushairy as a token of appreciation during the closing event.
